ModMetaData.name: Better Map Sizes (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Madara Uchiha, Krzysztof Zawisla
ModMetaData.description:
Enables custom map sizes through the Advanced menu on the world map during map generation. Also, allows for setting the default map size to use when generating tiles (in case you forget to use the Advanced menu).
Important note!:
Making changes in the advanced menu impacts mod settings too.
Original mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2099101052 Fork: https://github.com/KrzysztofZawisla/BetterMapSizes/tree/snowdrop-version Original Source Code: https://github.com/MadaraUchiha/BetterMapSizes
Have fun and fork something outdated!
